line.text: Thou blind fool Love what dost thou to mine eyes
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That they behold and see not what they see
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: They know what beauty is see where it lies
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Yet what the best is take the worst to be
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: If eyes corrupt by over-partial looks
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Be anchored in the bay where all men ride
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Why of eyes falsehood hast thou forged hooks
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Whereto the judgment of my heart is tied
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Why should my heart think that a several plot
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Which my heart knows the wide world common place
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Or mine eyes seeing this say this is not
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To put fair truth upon so foul a face
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: In things right true my heart and eyes have erred
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And to this false plague are they now transferred
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
